summary: This mod adds a small monument right outside Whiterun. Its dedicated to all those brave men and women who stopped the introduction of a paywall system for Skyrim mods.
descriptionHtml:
If you find bugs please put them in the comments. Of course if you think something else is missing and should be added as well please let me know.

This mod adds a small monument right outside Whiterun. Its dedicated to all those brave men and women who stopped the introduction of a paywall system for Skyrim mods.

Current version 1.0

#####Update#######

After some very useful input I've added an alternative version to the file section. In this version an eternal flame has been added as well as a poem and memorial text from the comment section.

Many thanks to  LoneWanderer22,  terrorofskyrim and SilverZepher for their suggestions. :)
author: Steiner
